alert.note: Alert for Oregon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 2:02PM CDT until August 25 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Oregon County in south central Missouri... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 202 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Alton, or 14 miles north of Thayer, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alton, Thomasville and Rover. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
